pages.text: $(#9d1e2d)$(bold)FELLOW UNDEAD. YOU HAVE ENCOUNTERED A LIMITATION OF THE UNLIVING FORM, HAVEN'T YOU?$(p)WORRY NOT, THERE IS A SIMPLE SOLUTION.
$(#9d1e2d)$(bold)THERE EXISTS AN ITEM THAT WARDS OFF PAIN FROM ALCHEMY. IT IS WRITTEN IN THESE PAGES. $(p)GET IT, AND THE DIVINE POWER WILL BE UNABLE TO HARM YOU.

$(o)What the... who wrote this? Did someone -- something break into my lab? Reader, please ignore this passage. For a person to become undead... what an unsettling idea. It is impossible, isn't it? Surely.
